turkish_example_sentence: Onlar tiyatro oyununa gitmazlarsa kültürel deneyimlerini kaybederler.
english_example_sentence: If they were not to go to the theater play, they would lose their cultural experience.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они не пошли на театральный спектакль, они бы потеряли культурный опыт.
